attributes.action: Start teaching school children about mortgages, taxes, etc
attributes.additional_details: School children are not properly being taught about what mortgages, taxes, etc are which is negatively affecting their lives after they leave school as they do not know how these things work. It would also be useful to be taught basic life skills, such as how to care of yourself, budgeting, looking after others, etc as these are also not taught.
attributes.background: Introduce lessons on things like mortgages, taxes, and basic life skills for children at least 14 years old so that they can have some understanding of how they work before leaving school.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petition open which you might like to sign:

Include financial education in the national curriculum for primary schools
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601359
